sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the effect of emotion nursing to improve post-stroke depression for cerebral apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨情志护理对改善脑卒中后病人的抑郁状态效果。

sentences.english: Finally five kinds are the sentiment will literary arts Fu, in the content and the human emotion spirit related.
sentences.chinese: 最后五类是情志艺文赋，内容上与人类情感精神有关。

sentences.english: It analyses the development of emotions relates to five organs and mind.
sentences.chinese: 还分析了情志的产生与五脏和心神有关。

sentences.english: The main function of liver governing regulating is embodied in regulating emotion.
sentences.chinese: 肝主疏泄的主要功能体现在调畅情志方面。

sentences.english: From Huangdi Neijing, different emotions have different influence on the five zang-organs.
sentences.chinese: 《内经》认为不同的情志刺激可对各脏有不同的影响。

sentences.english: Laws in treatment of emotional diseases expounded in the Golden Chamber from science of TCM formula.
sentences.chinese: 从方剂学角度探讨《金匮要略》治疗情志疾病规律。

sentences.english: The crane, by Taoism introduction fairyland, entrusts with the noble and pure sentiment will the connotation.
sentences.chinese: 鹤，被道教引入仙境，赋予高洁情志的内涵。

definition: five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
joy depresses one's qi vital breath/an excess of joy may lead to sluggishness of vital energy (TCM)
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
